name: Sudarshan Dubey
about: Hi, I am interested in creating beautiful functional products which can solve user pain-points, I like learning about Startup's, Marketing and User Experience, I love working on challenging problems and learning new things & evolving myself. My reading lists include Technology, Computing and Design.

positions.subtitle: Groww
positions.description: As the Onboarding Business Manager at Groww, I lead a talented team focused on delivering a seamless and efficient onboarding experience for our users. My role involves optimising the end-to-end onboarding process to ensure that new customers can easily and quickly engage with our platform.
